sys_embedded_help_content.content:
Import Tables list

This list displays information about external Microsoft Excel data sources that have been imported into your instance. The Import Tables list is visible only to users with admin roles.

Click the column headers to search, sort, filter, and edit data.

The Import Tables list contains the following columns by default:
  • Name – The name given to the data source when the user uploaded it.
  • Table – The name assigned to the table by your instance.
  • Created by user – The user name of the user who uploaded the external file.
  • Filename – The filename of the uploaded Microsoft Excel file.
  • Active – Boolean value. True if the file has not yet expired. The user who uploads the file sets the expiration date.
  • Expiration days – Number of days before the expiration date specified when the file was uploaded.
  • Expire on date – The expiration date specified when the file was uploaded.
  • Expired – Boolean value. True if the expiration date has passed.
Related information
Using imported report data
sys_embedded_help_content.name: sys_report_import_table_list-normal
